scriptLines: dealership as (inventory as (id as short, make as string, model as string, price as short, specs as (engine as string, features as string[], transmission as string), year as short)[], location as string, name as string)

sources.name: DelimitedText14
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DelimitedText14

sources.name: AzureSqlTable1
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AzureSqlTable1

scripts.text:
ALTER TABLE [dim].[students_data]
ADD 
    TotalMarks INT,
    AverageMarks DECIMAL(5, 2),
    Grade Varchar(5);
